text:
yea I know his pronouns are all over the place
but you'll have to put up with me here

He is the Great Duke of the Abyss,
thou art the Lord of the deepest depths of 'dark' desires.

Staring at that face untouched by light,
the believer spoke their wish in a trembling, thin voice.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hah? You, did you dare to make a wish to me?
How presumptuous... for a tiny, insignificant being such as yourself.

Realizing they had offended him, the believer hurriedly
prostrated themselves, but it was already too late.
The fangs of a large palm sank into the believer's neck.

Ugh, aah... My body... It's hot...!
Y'golonac-sama, please, take my everything—!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Indeed, it is you who should entrust everything to me.
I shall devour you without hesitation. Gwahahahah!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Now then, what do you desire of me?
Lay bare your every desire before me.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Well, in the end, they will all be overwritten by your desire to serve me, anyway.
But if you happen to strike a chord with me, there might be a chance...!?

Shaking his bloated body, the higher being
asks the believer for a wish they want fulfilled.

It has always been this way, since time immemorial.
He lived thinking that this was simply how things were.

But, then, someone asked:
'Then, what wish will you speak on this night of miracles?'

And so, on the approach to the Fighting Festival,
this is what the Old One who transferred to Tokyo is up to now—

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hey, hey, there's a drink that's glowing like crazy!
What's the deal with that!? Does it make your tongue tingle!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
What's that fried pasta? It looks like it'd be a great snack with drinks!
Over there, is that takoyaki where you can choose your own fillings and the sauce!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
[Player], what do you want to eat?
Just tell Uncle, Uncle'll buy you anything you want, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, it's fine.
Uncle's gotta act the part every once in a while~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Wait, noooooo!
That's exactly why everyone keeps calling us parent and child!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-It's not that I hate it, okay?
It's more like... I'm troubled by how happy it makes me...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uncle's totally fine with the heartwarming feeling, but...
Maybe every now and then, something more moist, sticky, and squishy would be nice too?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahh, stop poking Uncle's 'marshmallow body'!
I have to eat a lot today too, to protect this cute belly...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh!? You want to 'devour' Uncle!?
Calm down, we just made it to the festival, you know~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Save the naughty stuff for later, okay?
Let's keep things sweet for now.

name: Y'golonac
text:
So, what'll it be?
Something hearty, or maybe an apple candy or cotton candy...?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Since we're here, Uncle wants to eat something festival-like.
Ooh, taiyaki looks good too~?

options.text: Let's get whatever you like, Y'golonac.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really~? Then how about that pizza-looking thing?
It looks filling and delicious!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For toppings, let's go with cheese, bacon, ham, corn, eggs...
Chicken, salami, and sausage!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, for Uncle!?
Is it because Uncle talked about being filial?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm so happy! Then, I'll take you up on that.
Can I get that salami pizza thing over there~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, wait. Uncle will buy it for you!
Uncle knows everything about you, [Player]!
At his words, he runs off frantically, returning with the exact festival food they were about to mention.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
See, I nailed it, right? We've been together a long time, after all.
From your taste in food to this and that... Gufufu.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I barely had any interest in others before.
You're the only one I've looked at with something other than desire.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Now then, once we've filled our bellies, think about what to do next, okay?
Uncle Santa will make it happen!

Y'golonac looks into [Player]'s face,
flashes a grin, and lowers his voice to 'whisper'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle will accept any 'desire' you have, you know?
Fulfilling your wishes is my job as your father figure, right?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Don't be shy, even bad wishes are totally okay!
Even things you couldn't tell your real father are always welcome!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
That's the best part about guys like me. Parent and child, lovers...
If you want... I can show you even the old 'me'?
It's more than just a double treat!

name: Y'golonac
text:
[Player], you're always such a sweet, good kid.
But for Christmas, why not let the 'restraints' come off a little?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm? Come on, tell me.
What do you want to do with Uncle~?

options.text: I want to be with you, Y'golonac.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that all?
You're so cute, Uncle has to spoil you to the best of his ability.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Actually, I felt the same way.
We're a perfect match, hihihi.

options.text: Let's enjoy the festival to the fullest!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that all?
You're so cute, Uncle has to spoil you to the best of his ability.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Actually, I felt the same way.
We're a perfect match, hihihi.
After hearing [Player]'s request, Y'golonac flashes the widest grin he's shown all day.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, you really can't hold back that much?
Kukuku, I see, I see, you're so adorable.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Alright, once we've looked around a bit more and the crowds thin out, let's head back early for some private time.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Since we're here, why don't we walk while holding hands?
It'll make things feel more special, don't you think?

name: Y'golonac
text:
No need to be on guard!
Though~ the mouth on my palm might give you a little lick!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Or maybe Uncle's mouths love [Player] so much
they'll end up biting you all on their own...

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, of course I'm joking, that'd cause all sorts of problems.
So I definitely won't bite, definitely!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I just realized.
Uncle's willpower is being tested to the limit right now, isn't it??

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uncle's restraint's already so loose, it'd be hard to keep my desire in check.
But Uncle doesn't want to let go, so I'll try my best!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, leave it to me.
I saw some parents and kids at the festival and thought it looked nice.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Being carried by me, an Old One, makes you a real big shot.
[Player], it's your own special seat, a view no one else can see, right?

options.text: (Ask to be carried in his arms)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's fine, but aren't you embarrassed?
Well, Uncle doesn't mind, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Doing this and calling you 'baby' makes me feel like a babysitter.
Well, some of my 'babies' do like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, for you... let's see.
'Shall we go, Princess?'
...Is that the line?

text:
The two of them continued to explore the festival venue.
Besides the food stalls, there were many game stalls and experiential stalls.

Among them, Y'golonac took a liking to
a stall for making handmade lanterns to decorate the venue.

There are two type to choose from, lanterns to hang in the sky,
or those that float on the water in the hot spring area.

Y'golonac naturally chose the latter,
and they headed toward the hot spring area.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmm hmm hmmm~, no one's here!
Now Uncle can take his time with you.

Y'golonac immediately floats the lantern they made on the water.
For some reason, it had a slightly mysterious shape.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Interesting. So other worlds have customs like this.
Writing a wish and letting it float is just like a wish to Santa.

name: Y'golonac
text:
No peeking! I heard it's bad luck
if people find out about these things.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Not that I have any right to say that, being so sensitive to desire.
You can show me yours, though, Uncle will make it come true for you!

options.text: My wish is a secret too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, is it something you can't even tell Uncle!?
Ugh... Now I'm super curious!?

options.text: Is it a wish that even I couldn't fulfill?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, it's not like that...
Wait, if I say that, then isn't totally obvious that it's a wish about you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're a bad kid, [Player]...!
I'm not saying anything else, my lips are zipped!

options.text: I was planning on fulfilling it for you though...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Really?
I won't forgive you if you're lying, even if it's you, [Player]?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Wait, [Player], so you caught on that it's a wish about you!?
I'm not saying anything else, my lips are zipped!

text:
Y'golonac stared at the lantern floating
on the water for a moment, making a prayer.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Still, I didn't have many good memories
of Christmas, but it's actually really fun.

Y'golonac recalls his time as an Old One.
Taking over a believer's body, to descend to the surface for brief a moment.

But his time was spent only on hunting his next victim.
Even when he stole a body, he never inherited the victim's memories.

Even if the person had a family,
Y'golonac never experienced the warmth of a family circle.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, most of Uncle's believers were people desperate for
a place to belong anyway, so the opportunity was rare.

name: Y'golonac
text:
So, the fact that I can feel this warm
inside now is all thanks to you, [Player].

name: Y'golonac
text:
The greatest gift in Uncle's entire life
is none other than you, [Player].

name: Y'golonac
text:
Really, thank you. For coming to Uncle,
and for staying with Uncle...

options.text: I'm glad the one who took me in was you.

text:
The moment those words were spoken,
tears suddenly overflowed from Y'golonac's eyes.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uuu... Sorry, my eyes are drooling...
I didn't think you'd hit me with a counter like that.

name: Y'golonac
text:
*sniff* ...But I don't think I've repaid you for everything yet,
*sniffle* ...so I'll work even harder.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Don't know what's gotten into me, but can I give you a big hug?
I just feel like doing it all of a sudden... *sniff*.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehehe...
It's strange, doing this makes me feels all warm and fuzzy inside.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uwaaaaaa, huuuug~!!
I'll squeeze you until you pop—!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, I'm so happy~
A moment like this is just Uncle's favorite!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehe, thank you.
Uncle just wants to be pampered by you right now.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle might actually be completely purified.
I never knew it felt so good to be given something.

name: Y'golonac
text:
I never knew, because all I did was take.
Uncle's gifts were usually a total scam.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Now, I think giving isn't so bad either.
It's really not like me, being a bad Old One and all.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Maybe Uncle should be nicer to
the babies' request once in a while.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?
But don't worry, the Uncle you see now is only for you, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see, then I won't do it.
Uncle doesn't want to do anything that makes you sad.

options.text: You'll have all the babies falling for you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, but don't worry, okay?
You'll always be Uncle's favorite.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle's willing to do anything,
and give everything to you, you know?

name: Y'golonac
text:
...It's embarrassing, but I'm being 'real' here.
That's just how much I love you.

Y'golonac moves very close to [Player].
And at that moment—

dialogue_after_selection.text: A gentle, delicate kiss that one can barely felt descends onto [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uncle can give proper mouth kisses too.
That's the 'proof' that you're special to me.

options.text: (Get a kiss on your left ring finger)

dialogue_after_selection.text: With a soft sound, Y'golonac gives the base of [Player]'s finger a little love-nip.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, did you notice?
Uncle Santa's ring was in a different place than usual.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You see, the meaning of a ring changes depending on where you wear it.
The left ring's the most famous, meant to strengthen love and the bonds between people.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's perfect for Uncle's wish, right?
Plus, it's a warning to everyone else, yes?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So, think of it as a charm from Uncle.
The 'proof' that you're special to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Let's head to the other tubs.
There were a few unusual ones over there.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Phew~ That was a good soak.
Maybe we should go to a hot spring inn together sometime.

After leaving the hot spring, Y'golonac dresses in his Santa outfit.
Whether if it was to keep warm, or by some other intent—

name: Y'golonac
text:
...You might have guessed from what Uncle said at the spring,
but Uncle's got a Christmas present for you.

name: Y'golonac
text:
I'm worried if you'll like it, but I prepared it after
asking people around me, so I can only hope that you liked it.

Y'golonac rummages through his bag
and takes out a present. From there, it's—

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Y'golonac encourages [Player] to open the beautiful packaging.
He watches nervously as they do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uwah!? Sorry, sorry, wrong one.
It's actually this one, so do open and take a look?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uwah, that stinks!
I forgot I shoved my spare clothes in there too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I just grabbed the wrong thing!
But they say a real Santa bag gives good kids what they want, so maybe...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, this is just a normal bag, so that's impossible!
...Though, Uncle will give it to you if you really want it...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Anyway, the real present is this box!
Do open and take a look.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Might be a bit cliché, but matching mufflers and gloves.
Now you can hold hands with Uncle without worry, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
They even got custom-made boar pins, aren't they cute?
Make sure to wear them this winter, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I tried my hand at icing cookies for the first time!
See, aren't the cookies with Uncle's face cute?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I usually only make simple meals, so I struggled a bit,
but I think they turned out pretty well.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Uncle thought about our future together a lot, and Uncle felt like it'd be better to bind us together in a visible way.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Somehow, I feel like you'll wander off the moment I look away.
I get that scary feeling when I look at you sometimes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, it's obviously not an engagement ring, so I'd be happy if you just wore it as a normal accessory.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Didn't I told you that it's fine?
Uncle's satisfied as long as you're happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Buuut, if you really want to give me something back, [Player], then maybe you can be my Santa?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: The festival is almost over, but you and Uncle's holy night is just beginning, no?

options.text: I didn't prepare anything in return.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Didn't I told you that it's fine?
Uncle's satisfied as long as you're happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Buuut, if you really want to give me something back, [Player], then maybe you can be my Santa?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: The festival is almost over, but you and Uncle's holy night is just beginning, no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, for Uncle...!?
Well, I didn't think you'd actually prepare something...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: I planned to act like it was my turn to get a present later~ or something, and then move it towards me asking for a wish.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But Uncle's so happy that you've done this, [Player]...
That's all it needed for Uncle's heart to go down~
Y'golonac pulls [Player] for a tight embrace, a fresh scent from the bath wafting from him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, can we just stay hugged like this all the way home?
...Uncle really doesn't want to let go.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

options.text: Okay, we can stay like this.

text:
Feeling a sense of regret as the festival venue recedes,
the two return to their home in Kabukicho.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ah, that was so much fun!
How about you, [Player]? You tired?

Y'golonac is a bit restless,
acting fidgety as he gauges [Player]'s state.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know, I know?
But, Christmas only lasts as much as today!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come on, please.
Just for today!
Can you stay with me a tiny bit longer~?

name: Y'golonac
text:
I actually prepared one more thing.
I wanted to make the most of Christmas with you, you see?

Y'golonac once more pulls a bright red
Santa outfit out of his bag of dreams.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hey, could you wear this and be Uncle's personal Santa?
It's my life's wish for this year!

options.text: I suppose I can do that much.

text:
Y'golonac's face lights up once he
realizes [Player] will dress up for him.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle will go change too~
Wouldn't it be weird if Uncle was a Santa as well?

However, the Santa outfit Y'golonac prepared was
a bit different from a normal Santa suit—

options.text: Isn't this design a bit insane?
So this is how you like it, huh...?
Now, do I look good, Y'golonac-papa?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hyuuu!! It's great! It's so great~!!
It suits you exactly as muuuuuch as Uncle thought it would!

After a moment of great joy, Y'golonac pulls on
[Player]'s hand, dragging them into his arms.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihi, Uncle's got the best personal Santa~!
Resign yourself and surrender!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Pity this Santa who fell into Uncle's clutches,
for you'll be put to work to satisfy Uncle's desires!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text: If Uncle stopped just by someone's words, then Uncle wouldn't be an evil Old One, no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey now, you won't escape Uncle anymore.
Just give up and get along, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'd never do something so wasteful!
Uncle's going to cherish you for the rest of your life, okay?

text:
Y'golonac's grip strengthens as he gets caught up in the mood,
holding [Player] tightly, confirming the feeling of them being in his arms.

options.text: Santa [Player] will fulfill it for you.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Oh, noooo, one after another,
the wishes inside me are just bubbling up!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
You know, before coming to this Tokyo and getting to meet you,
Uncle has never understood how Uncle's believers felt.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Actually, Uncle's gonna be honest?
This time around, I was pretty jealous of Jagannath.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Going to the same school, experiencing youth...
Uncle wants to do the same things with you, [Player]!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
You'd probably know that Uncle's a host, and that Uncle's a member
of the Second Business Faculty of Suidocho Business Academy, right?

The school, in the old Suidocho area of Shinjuku
offers lifelong learning courses for working adults.

Besides Y'golonac as a host, various students and
teachers of all ages are said to attend the same academy.

name: Y'golonac
text:
I want you to come to Suidocho, not the Police Academy...
Uncle wants to be [Player]'s classmate~!!

options.text: I'll give it a thought, Y'golonac.
Maybe that future will come someday?

name: Y'golonac
text:
And, and! Santa-san...
Can I make one more wish?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle has been alone, long been trapped behind these walls...
And now that Uncle's known this warmth, there's no turning back...

name: Y'golonac
text:
So, Santa-san, Uncle wants you to be someone precious...
Won't you fulfill this Uncle's wish?

note:
woooooooooo nesting choices!!!!!!
in case it wasn't obvious, Option 2 and 3 are links

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hihi, I'm happy.
That means you like you and Uncle's current relationship, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, [Player].
I'll spoil you to the max until Christmas is over.
Y'golonac doesn't know what a real parent-and-child relationship is like, but for them, this must be the right answer—

text:
The lantern gently floating on the water.
The wish entrusted to its light, was a pure and precious 'desire'.

Y'golonac feels a premonition in the warmth in his chest,
that the wish might come true sooner than expected.

No one knows what the future holds for the two of them.
Under the holy night, 'dreams' appear and vanish, just like champagne bubbles—
